🧐 FAQs about the extension 

🏨 How to install extension
🔸 To install an extension in Google Chrome, first, open Chrome on your computer.. 
🔸 Then, navigate to the Web Store.
🔸 Search for the desired software, click on it to view its details, and finally, click the "Add to" button to install it.

🌻 How to see calculation history
🔸 To view calculation history in a Chrome extension, click on the extension's icon in the Chrome toolbar. 
🔸 Then, locate and click on the History button that opens the history feature within the extension. 
🔸 Once accessed, you'll be able to see a list of past calculations, typically displayed in a separate window or sidebar within the tool interface.

😉 How to use extension offline
🔸 To use a Chrome extension offline, ensure that you've installed the solution while online. 
🔸 Once installed, you can access the tool even when offline by opening a new tab in Chrome and clicking on the icon. 
🔸 The calculator should function normally without requiring an internet connection, allowing you to perform calculations offline
